name.baseName: municipal wastewater treatment ; sludge ; Aerobic composting
市政污水处理; 污泥 ;好氧堆肥

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Aerobic composting technology is a biological treatment method that decomposes and transforms organic wastes in an oxygen-rich environment. By controlling the ventilation and humidity of the compost heap and promoting the growth and activity of microorganisms, the organic wastes are decomposed into stable organic fertilizers in a relatively short period of time. This technology can effectively reduce the volume of organic waste and the content of hazardous substances, while producing high-quality organic fertilizers that are environmentally friendly and recyclable.
好氧堆肥技术是一种将有机废料在氧气充足的环境下进行分解和转化的生物处理方法。通过控制堆肥堆的通风和湿度，促进微生物的生长和活动，使有机废料在较短的时间内分解成稳定的有机肥料。这种技术能够有效地减少有机废料的体积和有害物质含量，同时生产出高质量的有机肥料，对环境友好且可循环利用。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The aerobic composting process involves the mixing and stacking of raw materials, sufficient oxygen in the pile, and the decomposition of organic waste by microorganisms to produce heat and carbon dioxide, which is ultimately converted into a stable organic fertilizer.
好氧堆肥过程包括原料混合堆积，堆内氧气充足，微生物分解有机废料产生热量和二氧化碳，最终转化为稳定的有机肥料。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The aerobic composting process of sewage sludge described by this data set is utilized in municipal wastewater treatment facilities. It is a crucial step in the treatment sequence, designed to stabilize and sanitize sewage sludge thereby transforming it into compost that can be used for agricultural or landscaping applications.
该数据集描述的污泥好氧堆肥过程在市政污水处理设施中使用。它是处理序列中的一个关键步骤，旨在稳定和消毒污泥，从而将其转化为可用于农业或园林绿化的堆肥。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, G. et al. A Megacity-Scale Analysis of Sludge Managementand Carbon Footprint in China. Pol. J. Environ. Stud. 31, 2451–2460 (2022).
Zhao, G. et al. A Megacity-Scale Analysis of Sludge Managementand Carbon Footprint in China. Pol. J. Environ. Stud. 31, 2451–2460 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set, it is crucial to consider the specific context of the aerobic composting operation within the municipal wastewater treatment process. Methodological considerations must include the assessment of energy input, greenhouse gas emissions, and the final quality of the compost produced. Ensure that any use of this data is consistent with the technological applicability of the facilities and incorporates local environmental regulations and standards for waste treatment and compost use. It is also recommended to consider the inclusion or exclusion of upstream and downstream processes such as the production and transportation of sludge or the use of compost in various applications.
在使用此数据集时，必须考虑市政污水处理过程中好氧堆肥操作的具体背景。方法论考虑必须包括对能源投入、温室气体排放以及最终产生的堆肥质量的评估。确保使用此数据与设施的技术适用性一致，并且纳入本地环境法规以及废弃物处理和堆肥使用的标准。还建议考虑是否包括污泥的生产和运输等上游和下游过程，或者堆肥在各种应用中的使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
